meanings.definition: Pseudoparenchymata: a type of tissue that resembles parenchyma but is not true parenchyma.
meanings.sent1: The pseudoparenchymata in the plant looked similar to parenchyma but had some differences.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the pseudoparenchymata to understand its unique characteristics.
meanings.sent3: The pseudoparenchymata tried to imitate the real parenchyma but couldn't quite pull it off.
meanings.sent4: Her words formed a pseudoparenchymata of truth, appearing solid but lacking the core.
meanings.sent5: The pseudoparenchymata tissue was like a mimic, pretending to be something it was not.
